verses.verse: <WG1161> There were present <WG3918> <WG5713> at <WG1722> that season <WG846> <WG2540> some <WG5100> that told <WG518> <WG5723> him <WG846> of <WG4012> the Galilaeans <WG1057>, whose <WG3739> blood <WG129> Pilate <WG4091> had mingled <WG3396> <WG5656> with <WG3326> their <WG846> sacrifices <WG2378>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answering <WG611> <WG5679> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Suppose ye <WG1380> <WG5719> that <WG3754> these <WG3778> Galilaeans <WG1057> were <WG1096> <WG5633> sinners <WG268> above <WG3844> all <WG3956> the Galilaeans <WG1057>, because <WG3754> they suffered <WG3958> <WG5754> such things <WG5108>?
I tell <WG3004> <WG5719> you <WG5213>, Nay <WG3780>: but <WG235>, except <WG3362> ye repent <WG3340> <WG5725>, ye shall <WG622> all <WG3956> likewise <WG5615> perish <WG622> <WG5698>.

I tell <WG3004> <WG5719> you <WG5213>, Nay <WG3780>: but <WG235>, except <WG3362> ye repent <WG3340> <WG5725>, ye shall <WG622> all <WG3956> likewise <WG3668> perish <WG622> <WG5698>.

He spake <WG3004> <WG5707> also <WG1161> this <WG5026> parable <WG3850>; A certain <WG5100> man had <WG2192> <WG5707> a fig tree <WG4808> planted <WG5452> <WG5772> in <WG1722> his <WG846> vineyard <WG290>; and <WG2532> he came <WG2064> <WG5627> and sought <WG2212> <WG5723> fruit <WG2590> thereon <WG1722> <WG846>, and <WG2532> found <WG2147> <WG5627> none <WG3756>.

Then <WG1161> said he <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> the dresser of his vineyard <WG289>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, these three <WG5140> years <WG2094> I come <WG2064> <WG5736> seeking <WG2212> <WG5723> fruit <WG2590> on <WG1722> this <WG5026> fig tree <WG4808>, and <WG2532> find <WG2147> <WG5719> none <WG3756>: cut <WG1581> it <WG846> down <WG1581> <WG5657>; why <WG2444> <WG2532> cumbereth <WG2673> <WG5719> it <WG846> the ground <WG1093>?

And <WG1161> he answering <WG611> <WG5679> said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, YY <WG2962>, let <WG863> it <WG846> alone <WG863> <WG5628> this <WG5124> year <WG2094> also <WG2532>, till <WG2193> <WG3755> I shall dig <WG4626> <WG5661> about <WG4012> it <WG846>, and <WG2532> dung <WG906> <WG5632> <WG2874> it:
And if <WG2579> <WG3303> it bear <WG4160> <WG5661> fruit <WG2590>, well: and if not <WG1490>, then after that <WG1519> <WG3195> <WG5723> thou shalt cut <WG1581> it <WG846> down <WG1581> <WG5692>.
And <WG1161> he was <WG2258> <WG5713> teaching <WG1321> <WG5723> in <WG1722> one <WG3391> of the synagogues <WG4864> on <WG1722> the sabbath <WG4521>.

And <WG1161> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> her <WG846>, he called <WG4377> <WG5656> her to him, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto her <WG846>, Woman <WG1135>, thou art loosed <WG630> <WG5769> from thine <WG4675> infirmity <WG769>.

And <WG2532> he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> <WG5656> her <WG846>: and <WG2532> immediately <WG3916> she was made straight <WG461> <WG5681>, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> <WG5707> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> the ruler of the synagogue <WG752> answered <WG611> <WG5679> with indignation <WG23> <WG5723>, because <WG3754> that Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had healed <WG2323> <WG5656> on the sabbath <WG4521> day, and said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto the people <WG3793>, There are <WG1526> <WG5748> six <WG1803> days <WG2250> in <WG1722> which <WG3739> men ought <WG1163> <WG5748> to work <WG2038> <WG5738>: in <WG1722> them <WG5025> therefore <WG3767> come <WG2064> <WG5740> and be healed <WG2323> <WG5744>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> on the sabbath <WG4521> day <WG2250>.

The YY <WG2962> then <WG3767> answered <WG611> <WG5662> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Thou hypocrite <WG5273>, doth <WG3089> not <WG3756> each one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> on the sabbath <WG4521> loose <WG3089> <WG5719> his <WG846> ox <WG1016> or <WG2228> his ass <WG3688> from <WG575> the stall <WG5336>, and <WG2532> lead him away <WG520> <WG5631> to watering <WG4222> <WG5719>?

And <WG2532> when he <WG846> had said <WG3004> <WG5723> these things <WG5023>, all <WG3956> his <WG846> adversaries <WG480> <WG5740> were ashamed <WG2617> <WG5712>: and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the people <WG3793> rejoiced <WG5463> <WG5707> for <WG1909> all <WG3956> the glorious things <WG1741> that were done <WG1096> <WG5740> by <WG5259> him <WG846>.

Then <WG1161> said he <WG3004> <WG5707>, Unto what <WG5101> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316> like <WG3664>? and <WG2532> whereunto <WG5101> shall I resemble <WG3666> <WG5692> it <WG846>?

It is <WG2076> <WG5748> like <WG3664> a grain <WG2848> of mustard seed <WG4615>, which <WG3739> a man <WG444> took <WG2983> <WG5631>, and cast <WG906> <WG5627> into <WG1519> his <WG1438> garden <WG2779>; and <WG2532> it grew <WG837> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> waxed <WG1096> <WG5633> <WG1519> a great <WG3173> tree <WG1186>; and <WG2532> the fowls <WG4071> of the air <WG3772> lodged <WG2681> <WG5656> in <WG1722> the branches <WG2798> of it <WG846>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Whereunto <WG5101> shall I liken <WG3666> <WG5692> the kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316>?

It is <WG2076> <WG5748> like <WG3664> leaven <WG2219>, which <WG3739> a woman <WG1135> took <WG2983> <WG5631> and hid <WG1470> <WG5656> in <WG1519> three <WG5140> measures <WG4568> of meal <WG224>, till <WG2193> <WG3739> the whole <WG3650> was leavened <WG2220> <WG5681>.

And <WG2532> he went <WG1279> <WG5711> through <WG2596> the cities <WG4172> and <WG2532> villages <WG2968>, teaching <WG1321> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> journeying <WG4160> <WG5734> <WG4197> toward <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2419>.

Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> <WG5627> one <WG5100> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, YY <WG2962>, are there few <WG1487> <WG3641> that be saved <WG4982> <WG5746>? And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>,

Strive <WG75> <WG5737> to enter in <WG1525> <WG5629> at <WG1223> the strait <WG4728> gate <WG4439>: for <WG3754> many <WG4183>, I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, will seek <WG2212> <WG5692> to enter in <WG1525> <WG5629>, and <WG2532> shall <WG2480> not <WG3756> be able <WG2480> <WG5692>.

When once <WG575> <WG3739> <WG302> the master of the house <WG3617> is risen up <WG1453> <WG5686>, and <WG2532> hath shut <WG608> <WG5661> to the door <WG2374>, and <WG2532> ye begin <WG756> <WG5672> to stand <WG2476> <WG5760> without <WG1854>, and <WG2532> to knock <WG2925> <WG5721> at the door <WG2374>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, YY <WG2962>, open <WG455> <WG5657> unto us <WG2254>; and <WG2532> he shall answer <WG611> <WG5679> and say <WG2046> <WG5692> unto you <WG5213>, I know <WG1492> <WG5758> you <WG5209> not <WG3756> whence <WG4159> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748>:

Then <WG5119> shall ye begin <WG756> <WG5698> to say <WG3004> <WG5721>, We have eaten <WG5315> <WG5627> and <WG2532> drunk <WG4095> <WG5627> in thy <WG4675> presence <WG1799>, and <WG2532> thou hast taught <WG1321> <WG5656> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> streets <WG4113>.

But <WG2532> he shall say <WG2046> <WG5692>, I tell <WG3004> <WG5719> you <WG5213>, I know <WG1492> <WG5758> you <WG5209> not <WG3756> whence <WG4159> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748>; depart <WG868> <WG5628> from <WG575> me <WG1700>, all <WG3956> ye workers <WG2040> of iniquity <WG93>.

There <WG1563> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> weeping <WG2805> and <WG2532> gnashing <WG1030> of teeth <WG3599>, when <WG3752> ye shall see <WG3700> <WG5667> Avraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> Yitz'chak <WG2464>, and <WG2532> Ya`akov <WG2384>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the prophets <WG4396>, in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG1161> you <WG5209> yourselves thrust <WG1544> <WG5746> out <WG1854>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, there are <WG1526> <WG5748> last <WG2078> which <WG3739> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> first <WG4413>, and <WG2532> there are <WG1526> <WG5748> first <WG4413> which <WG3739> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> last <WG2078>.

The same <WG1722> <WG846> day <WG2250> there came <WG4334> <WG5656> certain <WG5100> of the P'rushim <WG5330>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto him <WG846>, Get thee out <WG1831> <WG5628>, and <WG2532> depart <WG4198> <WG5737> hence <WG1782>: for <WG3754> Herod <WG2264> will <WG2309> <WG5719> kill <WG615> <WG5658> thee <WG4571>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Go ye <WG4198> <WG5679>, and tell <WG2036> <WG5628> that <WG5026> fox <WG258>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, I cast out <WG1544> <WG5719> devils <WG1140>, and <WG2532> I do <WG2005> <WG5719> cures <WG2392> to day <WG4594> and <WG2532> to morrow <WG839>, and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> day I shall be perfected <WG5048> <WG5743>.

Nevertheless <WG4133> I <WG3165> must <WG1163> <WG5748> walk <WG4198> <WG5738> to day <WG4594>, and <WG2532> to morrow <WG839>, and <WG2532> the day following <WG2192> <WG5746>: for <WG3754> it cannot be <WG3756> <WG1735> <WG5736> that a prophet <WG4396> perish <WG622> <WG5641> out of <WG1854> Yerushalayim <WG2419>.

O Yerushalayim <WG2419>, Yerushalayim <WG2419>, which <WG3588> killest <WG615> <WG5723> the prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> stonest <WG3036> <WG5723> them that are sent <WG649> <WG5772> unto <WG4314> thee <WG846>; how often <WG4212> would <WG2309> <WG5656> I have gathered <WG1996> thy <WG4675> children <WG5043> together <WG1996> <WG5658>, as <WG3739> <WG5158> a hen <WG3733> doth gather her <WG1438> brood <WG3555> under <WG5259> her wings <WG4420>, and <WG2532> ye would <WG2309> <WG5656> not <WG3756>!

Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, your <WG5216> house <WG3624> is left <WG863> <WG5743> unto you <WG5213> desolate <WG2048>: and <WG1161> verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, <WG3754> Ye shall <WG1492> not <WG3364> see <WG1492> <WG5632> me <WG3165>, until <WG2193> <WG302> the time come <WG2240> <WG5661> when <WG3753> ye shall say <WG2036> <WG5632>, Blessed <WG2127> <WG5772> is he that cometh <WG2064> <WG5740> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of the YY <WG2962>.
